title: Butchers Bridge not updating match history
body:
I've played 2 ARAM games on Butchers Bridge and it hasn't came up on my match history or added to the rewards. I have attached a screenshot proving that I did indeed play a game on it.

http://prntscr.com/7wdnhs

replies.body:
Hey NotCody,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce

Hey NotCody,

Thanks for reporting this issue. This information has been passed on to NOC, and they're currently looking into it.
